CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Displays the game in fullscreen mode. (Requires restart)

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Confirm rest
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Gives a question about whether you want to rest when entering a bed. Otherwise, you will always automatically rest.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Confirm attack
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enables the 'Do you want to attack..?' dialog box when attacking a monster.

ListPreference.android:title: Display monster loot
ListPreference.android:summary: Choose how you want to show the results of a fight to be shown (gold, experience, items).
